name: PROJECT ABEL
description:
During the second World War, a conscript finds himself waking in a nightmarish reality. He must find his brother.

Project Abel is an upcoming 2D indie game inspired by classic survival horror titles such as Resident Evil and Silent Hill - with a 16-bit aesthetic. Project Abel will blend all the punishing mechanics of older survival horror games into a cohesive, tense experience that fans of such titles won’t forget.

Follow here for updates:

projectabel.tumblr.com/ 

https://twitter.com/ProjectAbelGame?lang=en

[CONTROLLER RECOMMENDED]

If you find any bugs, please describe it in the comments preferably with a screenshot so I can try to replicate and solve it.  Thanks.
